de.zabuza.jumpPokemon.scenes

Class Scene

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.zabuza.jumpPokemon.scenes.Scene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SoundListener, SoundSource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LevelScene, TitleScene

    public abstract class Scene
extends java.lang.Object
implements SoundListener
    Abstract class for Scenes.
    Author:
    Zabuza

        public static boolean[] getKeys()
        Gets the key container of the scene, true for pressed, false for released.

        Key container of the scene

        public final boolean addSprite(Sprite sprite)
        Adds a sprite to the scene.
        Parameters:
        sprite - Sprite to add
        Returns:
        True if sprite was added to the scene

        Gets the SoundEngine of the scene.
        Returns:
        SoundEngine from the scene

      • removeSprite

        public final boolean removeSprite(Sprite sprite)
        Removes a sprite from the scene.
        Parameters:
        sprite - Sprite to remove
        Returns:
        True if sprite was removed from the scene

      • render

        public abstract void render(java.awt.Graphics g,
          float alpha)
        Renders the scene on a Graphics object.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics object to draw on
        alpha - 1 if all ticks for the second are done, 0 if none is done, 0.5 if half etc.

      • setSound

        public final void setSound(SoundEngine thatSound)
        Sets the SoundEngine for the scene. Adds the scene to the listener list of the SoundEngine
        Parameters:
        thatSound - SoundEngine to set

      • tick

        public abstract void tick()
        Triggered every Tick, logic of scene.

      • toggleKey

        public final void toggleKey(int key,
             boolean isPressed)
        Toogles a key and saves it in the keys[] container.
        Parameters:
        key - Key index specified by Commons which is toogled
        isPressed - True for pressed, false for released
